title: Baba Yaga: a Russian fairy tale
brief_description: Presented as an on-line interactive storybook to read page by page with silhouetted illustrations, this Russian fairy tale tells the story of Vasilissa, her evil stepmother and Baba Yaga, the wicked witch who lives deep in the forest.
